    • Constructor Detail

      • ProfileController

        @Inject
public ProfileController​(controllers.AssetsFinder assetsFinder,
                         AchievementFactory achievementFactory,
                         UserFactory userFactory)
        contructor of ProfileCOntroller
        Parameters:
        assetsFinder -
        achievementFactory - allows access to achievements
        userFactory - allows access to users

    • Method Detail

      • profile

        public play.mvc.Result profile​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        passe's on to user's profile with important parameters
        Parameters:
        request - has to include user_id of user
        Returns:
        Status OK, if HTML page is shown with parameters username, score, highscore and gamesPlayed

      • updateProfile

        public play.mvc.Result updateProfile​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        gets new username and picture source of user to update user's profile. If the new name equals the old name, it wont get updated again in the DB. If the new name equals a another name of a different users in the DB, it returns a badRequest.
        Parameters:
        request - has to include the user_id in the session and the new username and new picture source in the body
        Returns:
        Status Ok, if everything gets updated

      • getPictureId

        public int getPictureId​(java.lang.String src)
        gives the right picture_id to the given picture source to be saved in the DB
        Parameters:
        src - picture source is given from method updateProfile
        Returns:
        the right picture_id to the given picture source. Picture_id 7 is the default value of the pictures and shows a gray avatar.

      • getAchievements

        public play.mvc.Result getAchievements​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        gets achievements from user to be shown in the profile
        Parameters:
        request - has to include user_id of user in the session
        Returns:
        Status OK, if Map with achievement_id as key and achievement achievement as value gets passed on as Json

      • getNewFriendAchievement

        public play.mvc.Result getNewFriendAchievement​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        if a new friend gets added, this method checks if you get a new FriendAchievement
        Parameters:
        request - has to include user_id of user in the session
        Returns:
        Status OK, if a Map with achievement_id as key and achievement as value of all new FriendAchievements of the user gets passed on as Json

      • getFriends

        public play.mvc.Result getFriends​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        gets friends of user to be shown in profile
        Parameters:
        request - session has to include user_id of user
        Returns:
        Status OK, if List of names of user's friends as Strings gets passed on as Json

      • validateNewFriend

        public play.mvc.Result validateNewFriend​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        validates new friend, if friend is a user in the DB, friend is not user itself and user has new friend not already as a friend
        Parameters:
        request - has to include user_id of user in the session and friend's name in the body
        Returns:
        Status Ok, if the Boolean true, when friend got added, or false, when friend got not added gets passed on as Json

      • showFriend

        public play.mvc.Result showFriend​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        adds friend's name to session, when user wants to see friend's profile
        Parameters:
        request - has to include user_id of the user in the session
        Returns:
        Status OK and adds friend's name to the session

      • getPicture

        public play.mvc.Result getPicture​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        gets picture_id of user to be shown in profile
        Parameters:
        request - session has to include user_id of user
        Returns:
        Status OK, if user's picture_id gets passed on as Json
